channel.title: [PI] Designating certain customs to certain equipment tabs? [PI]
channel.description: I got my customs all set and now i need to set them to the right equipment spot. Please tell me what folder, how to do it, where to do it and anything else possibly needed to make this happen. I also need to know how to add in Bonuses because i can't have a Korasi sword with no bonuses... Please Help!

item.title: [PI] Designating certain customs to certain equipment tabs? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Yes. Is there anyway i need to add the custom item in server sided aswell? Because when i wield my Korasi sword it says im not Wielding anything but it shows the sword onb my character. I also habe the EquipmentEditor saved to Data/data/… and whenever i add in the item and change, load then save nothing happens… Can someone tv me?

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Designating certain customs to certain equipment tabs? [PI]

item.title: [PI] Designating certain customs to certain equipment tabs? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

adamknightz:

Server I downloaded came with a Executable Jar File called “EquipmentEditor” that allows me to change the slot an item goes to. I’m not sure how to change the slot any other way, but maybe you should look for such a file on your server.

Thats the answer.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Designating certain customs to certain equipment tabs? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @adamknightz adamknightz
item.description:
@adamknightz wrote:

Server I downloaded came with a Executable Jar File called “EquipmentEditor” that allows me to change the slot an item goes to. I’m not sure how to change the slot any other way, but maybe you should look for such a file on your server.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Designating certain customs to certain equipment tabs? [PI]

item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Ok, I am still learning this so where do i put in the different arrays in ItemAssistant.java? Same with bonuses how do i enter? Could you give me an example of each please?

item.title: [PI] Designating certain customs to certain equipment tabs? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @chazion chazion
item.description:
@chazion wrote:

for the right equip slot, go to itemassistant i think?

for bonuses, add the item in item.cfg or something like that and add the bonuses from there.
